Buff.Name: Seal of Healing
Buff.Description: EXP gain increase 50%/Automatic Life recovery at 5%

Buff.Name: Seal of Divinity
Buff.Description: Item gain increase at 150%/Automatic Mana recovery at 5%

Buff.Name: Talisman of Protection
Buff.Description: You receive no penalties when dying../Cannot receive this effect when you are in outlaw status.

Buff.Name: Seal of Strength
Buff.Description: Increases Attack Rate and Defense Rate

Buff.Name: Bless of Light (Greater)
Buff.Description: Earning additional 200% EXP after quick blessing
